name: Authorization.
description:
As a user that has been registered on the site, I want to be able to access
  my account settings and my feed in order to enjoy new information in my feed
  and contact with my friends.

name: Registration
description:
As a person who wants to connect with their friends, I want to be able
  to create freefeed account to be able to create my own home feed and
  subscribe to people.
